metadata.title: Temporal Mastery (Temporal System Overhaul)
metadata.author: kokoro11
metadata.description:
This mod makes the Temporal System affect not only the speed of the crew in the room, but also the speed of the systems. For example, you can now use the Temporal System on weapon system to speed up or slow down weapon charging. Detailed effects on systems are listed below.
Shield: increase shield recharge rate (+0.4x, +1.0x, +2.0x, +6.5x) charge energy shields when shields are fully powered / decrease shield recharge rate (-0.5x)
Engine: increase ship evasion (about 5 * engine power * temporal level * 0.6) increase FTL charge rate (+0.28x, +1.56x, +4.12x, +9.24x) / decrease ship evasion (about 5 * engine power * temporal level / 3) decrease FTL charge rate (-0.5x)
Oxygen: increase oxygen refill rates (+1.0x, +3.0x, +7.0x, +15.0x) / decrease oxygen refill rates (-0.75x, -0.88x, -0.94x, -0.97x)
Weapon: increase weapon charge rates (+0.25x, +0.7x, +1.5x, +5.0x) / decrease weapon charge rates (-0.5x)
Drone: speed up crew drones (1.75x, 2.86x, 4.5x, 12.5x) speed up space drones (1.2x, 1.7x, 2.4x, 6.0x) / reduce max power by an amount equal to temporal level (-1, -2, -3, -4)
Medbay: (requires an internal upgrade) speed up all allied crew members on player's ship (1.75x, 2.86x, 4.5x, 12.5x) / no custom effects
Pilot: increase ship evasion (5 * manning level * temporal level) increase manning bonus when temporal level is above 1 / decrease ship evasion (3 * (4 - manning level) * temporal level)
Sensor: provide manning bonus even when system is not manned / reduce max power by an amount equal to temporal level (-1, -2, -3, -3)
Door: provide manning bonus even when system is not manned / reduce max power by an amount equal to temporal level (-1, -2, -3, -3)
Teleporter: (requires an internal upgrade) speed up all allied crew members on enemy ship (1.75x, 2.86x, 4.5x, 12.5x) / reduce max power by an amount equal to half of temporal level (-1, -1, -2, -2)
Cloaking: increase evasion when cloaking is active (5 * cloaking * temporal) / decrease evasion when cloaking is active (5 * (5 - cloaking) * temporal)
Artillery: increase artillery charge rate (+0.5x, 1.4x, +3.0x, +10.0x) / decrease artillery charge rate (-0.75x)
Battery: slowly generate bonus power when battery is turned on / reduce max power by an amount equal to temporal level (-1, -2, -3, -4)
Clonebay: no custom effects / no custom effects
Mind Control: allow multi-person mind control when mind control is active the number of mind controlled is equal to (mind control level * temporal level) / reduce max power by an amount equal to half of temporal level (-1, -1, -2, -2)
Hacking: allow cluster hacking when hacking is active the area of cluster hacking is equal to temporal level (costs 1 drone part for each extra system hacked) / reduce max power by an amount equal to half of temporal level (-1, -1, -2, -2)
* All ion effects can be sped up (+0.5x, +1.43x, +3.0x, +10.0x) or slowed down (-0.5x). * Hacking can cancel out most custom effects listed above.
